title: Sahaayane Sahaayane Lyrics Sattai
stanzas:
Sahaayane Sahaayane
nenjukkul nee muzhaithaai
Sahaayane sahaayane
ennai nee yen parithaai

Un ennangal thaakki
en kannangal pookka
Nee vayathukku
vaasam thanthaai

Oru murai un perai
udhadugal sonnaale
Pasi indri povathenna

Pala murai sonnaalum
urangida ennaamal
Vizhi rendum kaetpathenna

Thavari vizhundha
porul pol
enai eduthaayada.
Thavanai muraiyil
unai naan
sirai pidithenada.

Pillai pole
ennai kaiyil yendhu
Ellai yethum illai
anbil neendhu neendhu

Kanavilum kaanaatha
vagaiyinil un thottram
Enakkulle koochal poda

Idhu varai ketkaatha
isai ena un pechu
Alavilla aattam poda

Kallap paarvai
ennai koththi thinna
Enna yethu endru
ullam enna enna

Sahaayane Sahaayane
nenjukkul nee muzhaithaai
Sahaayane sahaayane
ennai nee yen parithaai

Un ennangal thaakki
en kannangal pookka
Nee vayathukku
vaasam thanthaai
